intro.title: Fun and simple
intro.desc: A simple <0>RPG</0> style game on discord that is constantly <0>evolving</0>. All the <0>base mechanics</0> you expect and more.

features.title: Features
features.desc: Dbot is packed with <0>functionalities</0>. You can <0>hunt a monster</0> to have a chance to get his <0>loot</0> or even fight the strongests in a <0>PVP battle</0>.
